alert.note: Alert for Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 09 at 11:26AM EST until January 11 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Two to three feet of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Southern Baltimore and Southeast Harford Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 1 AM EST Thursday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 5.5 feet, widespread flooding of roads in downtown Baltimore is occurring, along with the Pier 4 promenade on both sides, the Pier 5 promenade on the west side, and much of the lower Inner Harbor area. At 5.0 feet, significant flooding is occurring in the Bowleys Quarters area with yards, roads, and homes flooded. At 6.0 feet, the marina office at the Havre de Grace Yacht Basin is flooded, along with the surrounding area. Hutchins Park is flooded, as is the parking lot at Roberts Park. The dock at Pier Number 1 is also covered by water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides up to 5 feet above normal. The next high tides at Havre de Grace are at 7:55 PM and 9:01 AM. The next high tides at Fort McHenry Baltimore are at 5:05 PM and 4:58 AM. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. NW Branch Patapsco River at Baltimore MD MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 5.0 ft, Major 6.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 10/05 AM 5.8 4.1 5.3 1.0 Moderate 10/05 PM 4.3 2.6 3.0 1.0 Minor 11/05 AM 2.4 0.7 1.9 0.5 None 11/06 PM 2.7 1.0 1.4 1.0 None 12/06 AM 1.8 0.1 1.2 0.5 None Chesapeake Bay at Bowleys Quarters MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 3.8 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.1 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 10/05 AM 5.3 3.6 4.8 2.0 Major 10/05 PM 4.2 2.5 2.9 1.0 Moderate 11/06 AM 2.0 0.3 1.5 0.5 None 11/07 PM 2.3 0.6 0.8 1.0 None 12/07 AM 1.5 -0.2 0.9 0.5 None Chesapeake Bay at Havre de Grace MD MLLW Categories - Minor 4.0 ft, Moderate 5.5 ft, Major 7.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.2 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 5.2 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 10/09 AM 6.6 4.2 5.5 3.0 Moderate 10/08 PM 6.0 3.6 3.8 2.0 Moderate 11/09 AM 3.1 0.7 2.0 1.0 None 11/09 PM 4.0 1.6 1.7 1.0 Minor &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
